start: Submit your location to receive historical photos.
help:
Hey ${userName}! I am a historical photo sending bot from pastvu.com.
Send me your location and I will send historical photos that were taken in that location.
You can set a specific period for photos in the settings.
emptyPhotos: There are no photos in this location. Try changing the period or submit a new location.
successSetPeriod: A new period has been set.

errors.errorSetPeriod: Error, please enter a valid period.
